name: react-native-zen-router-dev

scripts.code-sync: cd react-native-zen-router && npx tsc && cd ../example && yarn upgrade reac-native-zen-router && tsc
scripts.create-api-docs: rm -rf docs && npx typedoc && cp -r images docs/images && cp images/favicon.ico docs

description: This is a temporary package for making it public
author: seki
